title: Any rioters on this subforum
body:
Hi is there any rioters on this subforum who can tell me the status of my support ticket, it's been 2 days and it hasn't even been opened

Ticket id 23107413

replies.body:
We've been pretty overloaded with ticket requests lately, which will results in longer wait times than normal at the moment. I can 100% assure you that our specialists are working their butts off and will get back to you as soon as possible.

Let me know if you have additional questions.
